6.description: Ambrosia is the Greek mythological word for “Food of the Gods” which is a fitting description for this juicy, crunchy apple with a sweet honey flavour. Ambrosia apples are especially delicious eaten raw, and since they are slow to oxidize after they’re cut, they are perfect for slaws and fruit salads.
6.name: Apple (Ambrosia)

7.description: Braeburn apples are a spicy-sweet, red-skinned apple with hints of cinnamon and nutmeg. This crisp apple is very versatile. It’s great for snacking, cooking, baking, or incorporating fresh into salads. Braeburn apples are also a great source of dietary fibre and vitamin C!
7.name: Apple (Braeburn)

8.name: Blackberries

9.description: Gaming glory is within your sights with this Dell 27" monitor. Designed for serious gamers, it features a 1ms response time, NVIDIA G-SYNC, and a fast 144Hz refresh rate for smooth, precise movement without ghosting, tearing, or lag. Quad HD resolution and an ultra-thin bezel offer an immersive edge-to-edge viewing experience.
9.name: Dell 27 WQHD 144Hz 1ms GTG TN LED G-SYNC Gaming Monitor (S2716DGR) - Black

10.name: LG 27 4K UHD 60Hz 5ms GTG IPS LED FreeSync Ga

8.description: Blackberries have a unique flavor that is warmly sweet, slightly tart with earthy undertones. Like raspberries, Blackberries are not actually a berry, rather an aggregate fruit with individual drupelets that are held together by very fine, nearly invisible hairs. When ripe, Blackberries have a deep ink sheen with purple highlights. They're great as a snack, in salads, in berrie pies, and pair especially well with balsamic vinegar in dressings.
8.name: Blackberries

shoe.description: Featuring the same Tuned Air technology as its predecessors, the Nike Air Max Plus III updates the look with TPU fused to the upper while paying homage to the iconic colour fade of the OG.
shoe.name: Nike Air Max Plus III

shoe.availableSize: US6 US6.5 US7 US7.5 US8.5 US9.5 US10 US10.5 US11 US11.5 US12 US12.5 US13 US14
shoe.description: "Let your attitude make a splash with your Nike Air Max Plus, a "tuned" air experience offering premium stability and support. Featuring new colours but still nodding to the OG's gradient sunset stripes and wavy design lines, it celebrates the past while taking you into the future with attitude."
shoe.name: Nike Air Max Plus

shoe.availableSize: US6 US6.5 US7 US7.5 US8.5 US9.5 US10 US10.5 US11 US11.5 US12 US12.5 US13
shoe.description: Now you can take the path less travelled in the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 36 Trail GORE-TEX. Ready for wet weather and tough terrain, the GORE-TEX upper is weatherised to help keep your feet dry. Double Zoom Air units underfoot offer a springy feel, while an aggressive traction pattern helps you keep your footing wherever you run.
shoe.name: Pegasus 36 Trail GORE-TEX

shoe.availableSize: US5.5 US6 US5 US6.5 US7 US7.5 US8 US8.5 US9 US9.5 US10 US10.5 US11 US11.5 US12
shoe.description: Taking both height and craft to new levels, the Nike Air Force 1 Sage Low features a platform midsole and a pared-down upper for a bold yet feminine look.
shoe.name: Nike Air Force 1 Sage Low

shoe.availableSize: US5.5 US6 US5 US6.5 US7 US7.5 US8 US8.5 US9 US9.5 US10 US10.5 US11.5 US12
shoe.description: An icon hits the paths less travelled in the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 36 Trail. Perforated mesh upper offers breathable comfort, and double Zoom Air units cushion your stride. Outsole lugs optimise traction when running uphill.
shoe.name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 36 Trail
